planet.name: Kepler-305 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Xie 2014. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Xie 2014 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-305 c
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Xie 2014. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Xie 2014 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-305 d
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Rowe et al. 2014. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Rowe et al. 2014 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-305 e
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Armstrong et al. 2020. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Armstrong et al. 2020 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
